narrative:
At time of this inspection, licensee informed the Animal Care Inspector that he did not renew his USDA license which 
expired on June 4, 2020. Licensee voluntarily surrendered his old license certificate during this inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
End Section
